issue.title: Trusty: remote_endpoint: Transport endpoint is not connected

content.raw:
It seems that this could possibly be caused by https://svn.boost.org/trac/boost/ticket/8795

Basically, the async_connect seems indicate a successful connection even when it failed. That issue was in boost 1.54 (the version on trusty), and it looks like a fix was found 8 months ago, but maybe it hasn't been released?
content.html:
It seems that this could possibly be caused by https://svn.boost.org/trac/boost/ticket/8795
